module.name: Asterisk Info
module.description: Provides a snapshot of the current Asterisk configuration
module.changelog: *13.0.7* FREEPBX-12153 fix mobile view *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10254 Fix Queues html *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10209 htmlentities need to use UTF-8 *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9757 asterisk info bad data *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9648 asterisk info has no version information *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-9481 Asterisk Info error page *13.0.1alpha1* Complete reskin *12.0.1* Added PJSip Information FREEPBX-7135 *2.11.0.9* Include new license file *2.11.0.7* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.7 *2.11.0.6* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.6 *2.11.0.3* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.3 *2.11.0.2* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.2 *2.11.0.2* #6757 *2.11.0.1* Fixes #6288 adds XMPP (Motif) *2.10.0.1* #5523 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.3* #4893 *2.9.0.2* #4778 *2.9.0.1* #4755 *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update *2.8.0.2* localization updates *2.8.0.1* #4209 *2.8.0.0* #3703 *2.7.0.0* spelling fixes, localization updates *2.6.0.0* localizations, misc *2.5.0.1* #3157, #3153, #3077 (DAHDI Support) *2.5.0* #2845 tabindex *2.4.0.1* #2704 Asterisk 1.6 tweaks *2.4.0* bumped to 2.4 *0.3.0.1* bump for rc1 *0.3.0* #2187 Fix for Asterisk 1.4 *0.2.0* Add depends asterisk xml tag, proper error checking for manager connection, center table titles *0.1.0* Initial release
